extendedIngredients.name: canned garbanzo beans
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1- 15.5 oz can garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed several times

extendedIngredients.name: olive oil
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 Tablespoons garlic olive oil (or 2 T oil and 2 small cloves garlic)

extendedIngredients.name: pineapple juice
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1/4 cup pineapple juice + 1 Tablespoon vinegar (or all lemon juice)

extendedIngredients.name: sea salt
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1/3 teaspoon fine sea salt, or to taste

recipes.title: Gluten Free Hummus

winePairing.pairingText: Hummus works really well with Sparkling rosé and Sparkling Wine. If you're serving a selection of appetizers, you can't go wrong with these. Both are very food friendly and complement a variety of flavors. The Bellissima Sparkling rosé with a 4.5 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 24 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Bellissima Sparkling Rose
productMatches.description: This is an elegant, bright rosé, with hints of strawberry and grapefruit, and a soft, persistent foam. Uncorked at the very last minute, Bellissima Sparkling Rosé pairs perfectly with smoked salmon, shellfish, and seafood hor d’oeuvres such as tuna tartare, sushi, and sashimi.

recipes.instructions: Spice this recipe up with cumin, paprika, smoked paprika, hot sauce, roasted red peppers, green chile peppers, etc. If made spicy, serve with a bland chip. If made plain, serve with a spicy chip.

steps.step: Spice this recipe up with cumin, paprika, smoked paprika, hot sauce, roasted red peppers, green chile peppers, etc. If made spicy, serve with a bland chip. If made plain, serve with a spicy chip.
